author: matzew
msg: TRINIDAD-609 - Remove Unsupported Facets from tr:panelPage

author: niklas
msg: Resolved MIME4J-59: The TextBody instances created when parsing a message will now handle the decoding/encoding of qp and base64 bodies automatically as it was done in Mime4j 0.3.

author: niklas
msg: Saved txt files will now use the mime charset specified for the body part instead of the Java default.

author: borisk
msg: Remove repetitive calls to the getOwnerDocument() virtual function and in some
cases use the data member directly. Put DOMStringPool functionality directly
